product_name: Oakley Fives Squared Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Designed for small to medium faces, the Oakley Fives Squared Polarized Sunglasses offer a sleek, sophisticated look and polarized performance to those who have trouble finding sunglasses that fit. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses offer great durability. Black Iridum lenses are ideal for bright, well-lit conditions with reliable glare reduction and tuned light transmission. Oakley Fives Squared Polarized Sunglasses feature lightweight, flexible nylon frames that resist damaging stresses. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that extends the peripheral view.
short_description: Designed for small to medium faces, the Oakley Fives Squared Polarized Sunglasses offer a sleek, sophisticated look and polarized performance to those who have trouble finding sunglasses that fit.
